avalancheActivity.comment: Moderate avalanche danger above 1.800 m below that low danger. The main problem still a weak old snow cover underneath fresh snowdrift deposits. Danger spots are predominately in entries and peripheral areas of extremly steep gullies and bowls in the north to east expositions. There spontaneous glidingsnow or gliding loose snow avalanches coming from extremly steep slopes are possible.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Old snow in high altitudes still prone to triggering.

snowpackStructure.comment: The snowcover is moist. It was able to settle at least on the surface due to cooling. It softens only with sufficient radiation. In higher northwest to eastern sectors older mostly settled snowdrift areas existing. In places a old snow covers which is weakened due to equilibirum metamorphosis. This combination can be prone totriggering. Exposed areas are icy and hard. In steepp areas the wet snow cover is prone to glide when it is on smooth surfaces or grass.

tendency.highlights: On Sunday sunny mountain weather is called. The avalanche danger decreasing.

weatherForecast.comment: In the northeastern regions Friday night will be cloudy. During the day the mountain the weather is divergent. North of the Alpenhauptkamm a sunny day with only a few clouds in medium heights but it stays dry. Further south especially in the foothills the most time of the day is cloudy. The summits ar foggy the visibility is very poor. In the morning little snowfall is possible but in the afternoon precipitation stops and is cleares up. Winds are moderate in expose areas winds are brisk coming from south. Temperatures in 2.000 m are around -4 degrees, in 1.500 m around -1 degrees. In norther regions it will be milder.

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanche danger low. Only in some places spontaneous glidingsnow and wet loose snow avalanches coming from extremly steep slops are possible. Avoid areas below open gliding cracks. Risk of injuries is more likely than risks of falling or being buried.

snowpackStructure.comment: In general the snow amount is below the  average. Southern slopes and exposed areas are predominatels bare. the thin ssnow cover is settled on the surface. otherwhere it is wet. In places in northern and eastern exposed high-altitudes areas thin layers of Driftsnow which is weakened due to equilibrium metamorphosis.

tendency.highlights: On Sunday sunny mountain weather is called. No significant changes of the avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.comment: In the northeastern regions Friday night will be cloudy. During the day the mountain the weather is divergent. North of the Alpenhauptkamm a sunny day with only a few clouds in medium heights but it stays dry. Further south especially in the foothills the most time of the day is cloudy. The summits ar foggy the visibility is very poor. In the morning little snowfall is possible but in the afternoon precipitation stops and is cleares up. Winds are moderate in expose areas winds are brisk coming from south. Temperatures in 2.000 m are around -4 degrees, in 1.500 m around -1 degrees. In norther regions it will be milder.

customData.generalHeadline: Partially weak old snow in high altitudes.
